Class Bullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • Bullet

  • public class Bullet
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    ayule801 Represents a bullet fired by a gun

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bullet(double x, double y, double direction, double speed, double damage, boolean isGood)
      Creates a Bullet object that travels across the screen at an angle, speed, and certain amount of damage

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bullet

        public Bullet(double x,
              double y,
              double direction,
              double speed,
              double damage,
              boolean isGood)
        Creates a Bullet object that travels across the screen at an angle, speed, and certain amount of damage
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the bullet
        y - the y coordinate of the bullet
        direction - the angle at which this bullet is moving to the horizontal
        speed - the speed of the bullet
        damage - the amount of damage the bullet deals
        isGood - if the player fires a bullet it "isGood", other wise it is not so that the enemies can't kill each other, and the player can't run into its own bullet.

    • Method Detail

      • getX

        public double getX()
        Return the x coordinate of this bullet
        Returns:
        the x coordinate value of this bullet

      • getY

        public double getY()
        Return the y coordinate of this bullet
        Returns:
        the y coordinate value of this bullet

      • move

        public boolean move(Player p,
                    java.util.ArrayList<Enemy> enemies,
                    java.util.ArrayList<Structure> s)
        Moves this bullet to a new location (x,y)
        Parameters:
        p - the Player object
        enemies - the list of all enemies
        the - list of all structures
        Returns:
        returns true if the bullet should be deleted, false otherwise

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer,
                 processing.core.PImage Bullet)
        draws the bullet on the plane
        Parameters:
        drawer - object used to draw the bullet
        Bullet - the image of the bullet being drawn
